tool.name: PermAnalysisGriph
tool.command:
tar -zxvf $tar_Clustering -C /scratch &&
Rscript /home/main.R annotated_matrix $nCluster $Format $Separator $Sp FALSE 2>>$log &&
mkdir -p ${html_file.files_path} && tar -zcvf zipOutput.tar.gz -C /scratch/ . 2>>$log && cp -R /scratch/* ${html_file.extra_files_path} && bash $__tool_directory__/files.sh $html_file.extra_files_path $html_file

param.name: Separator
param.help: separator used in count file, e.g. '\\t', ','
